snippet: Third-placed Manchester City host Premier League leaders Chelsea on Saturday. Here are five memorable matches between the two clubs:...

headline.main: Five Memorable Matches Between Manchester City and Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Five Memorable Matches Between Manchester City and Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Third-placed Manchester City host Premier League leaders Chelsea on Saturday. Here are five memorable matches between the two clubs:

snippet: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has flown his squad to Barcelona on a two-day bonding trip ahead of the visit of West Ham United in the Premier League on Sunday, the Liverpool Echo reported....
lead_paragraph: Liverpool manager Juergen Klopp has flown his squad to Barcelona on a two-day bonding trip ahead of the visit of West Ham United in the Premier League on Sunday, the Liverpool Echo reported.

snippet: Arsenal centre back Per Mertesacker is nearing match fitness and is eyeing a return to action in the new year after spending the first half of the Premier League season on the sidelines due to a knee problem....

headline.main: Mertesacker Eyes New Year Return for Arsenal
headline.print_headline: Mertesacker Eyes New Year Return for Arsenal

lead_paragraph: Arsenal centre back Per Mertesacker is nearing match fitness and is eyeing a return to action in the new year after spending the first half of the Premier League season on the sidelines due to a knee problem.

snippet: Southampton must turn up the heat on themselves in order to pick up good results, midfielder Dusan Tadic said ahead of Thursday's Europa League encounter with Sparta Prague....

headline.main: Southampton Need Pressure in Order to Deliver, Says Tadic
headline.print_headline: Southampton Need Pressure in Order to Deliver, Says Tadic

lead_paragraph: Southampton must turn up the heat on themselves in order to pick up good results, midfielder Dusan Tadic said ahead of Thursday's Europa League encounter with Sparta Prague.

snippet: Midfielder Joey Barton has been charged with misconduct in relation to betting, the English Football Association (FA) said in a statement on Friday....

headline.main: Barton Hit With Misconduct Charge for Alleged Betting
headline.print_headline: Barton Hit With Misconduct Charge for Alleged Betting

lead_paragraph: Midfielder Joey Barton has been charged with misconduct in relation to betting, the English Football Association (FA) said in a statement on Friday.

snippet: Manager Eddie Howe praised Bournemouth's self-belief and said his side created an unforgettable memory after twice overcoming a two-goal deficit to beat Liverpool 4-3 in the Premier League on Sunday....

headline.main: Bournemouth Win Over Liverpool Was Unforgettable-Howe
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Win Over Liverpool Was Unforgettable-Howe

lead_paragraph: Manager Eddie Howe praised Bournemouth's self-belief and said his side created an unforgettable memory after twice overcoming a two-goal deficit to beat Liverpool 4-3 in the Premier League on Sunday.

snippet: Arsenal's Santi Cazorla will undergo ankle surgery and is set for a three-month spell on the sidelines, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Cazorla Ruled Out for Three Months With Ankle Injury
headline.print_headline: Cazorla Ruled Out for Three Months With Ankle Injury

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's Santi Cazorla will undergo ankle surgery and is set for a three-month spell on the sidelines, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte is keen to see how his side cope with the absence of striker Diego Costa and midfielder N'Golo Kante and may change his favoured 3-4-3 formation when Bournemouth visit in the Premier League on Monday....

headline.main: Conte Curious to See How Chelsea Fare Without Costa, Kante
headline.print_headline: Conte Curious to See How Chelsea Fare Without Costa, Kante

lead_paragraph: Chelsea manager Antonio Conte is keen to see how his side cope with the absence of striker Diego Costa and midfielder N'Golo Kante and may change his favoured 3-4-3 formation when Bournemouth visit in the Premier League on Monday.

snippet: Harry Kane and Christian Eriksen both scored twice as Tottenham ran riot against a sorry Swansea side to keep in touch with the top four and send their opponents back to the bottom of the Premier League on Saturday....

headline.main: Kane Double Helps Tottenham Thrash Sorry Swansea
headline.print_headline: Kane Double Helps Tottenham Thrash Sorry Swansea

lead_paragraph: Harry Kane and Christian Eriksen both scored twice as Tottenham ran riot against a sorry Swansea side to keep in touch with the top four and send their opponents back to the bottom of the Premier League on Saturday.

snippet: Juergen Klopp is looking forward to Liverpool's Premier League showdown against Manchester City after hearing that their manager, Pep Guardiola, was in attendance for his side's 4-1 victory over Stoke City at Anfield on Tuesday....

headline.main: Klopp Hopes 'Special Game' Is Bad Viewing for Pep
headline.print_headline: Klopp Hopes 'Special Game' Is Bad Viewing for Pep

lead_paragraph: Juergen Klopp is looking forward to Liverpool's Premier League showdown against Manchester City after hearing that their manager, Pep Guardiola, was in attendance for his side's 4-1 victory over Stoke City at Anfield on Tuesday.
